answers.answer: Ask the ophthalmologist if he would refer you to a neuroophthalmologist.Ask your family MD to order a A1C blood test to be sure you don't have diabetesJCHMD

question: Hi,I have had this problem with my left eye, some days its blurrier than others and some days not... I have tried everything, gone to a optomoligist to check my eyes and they said my eyes are healthy.  done a pressure test, opened up my pupils to look at the back of my eyes etc.  I have even got a new set of prescription glasses over the weekend and still the same...  At the time I got my prescription glasses changed, the left eye was clear, but today its blurry.. ie if I close my Righ eye, and only look through my left, the eye is blurry.  a few days ago they weren't etc.
title: left eye blurry sometimes
